title: Bang Bang Bang Lyrics Anjaan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Bang Bang Bang
Singer: Ranjith
Lyrics: Karky
Music: Yuvan
Movie: Ajaan
lyrics from teaserÂ

Bang bang bang
Bang bang bang

endha thottaavai eduththaalum
oru peru thaan
mumbai gate-ukkum road-ukkum
oru peru thaan

inga appaappa anganga
thee pattthumey
orr aabaththil avan peyar
kappaathumey.

andheri puli pera sonna
adi nenjula
bang bang bang

Raju bhai
onna kannaala paaththaaley
bang bang bang

Raju bhai vandhu
munnaala ninnaa
bang bang bang

Raju bhai
onna kannaala paaththaaley
bang bang bang

Raju bhai vandhu
munnaala ninnaa

endha thottaavai eduththaalum
oru peru thaan
mumbai gate-ukkum road-ukkum
oru peru thaan

Paasam ketta kottu thallu
vesam potta vetti thallu
raju bhai-in mandhiramey
adhudhaaney.

Kovam vandha aara podu
neram vandha kooru podu
raju bhai-in thandhiramey
adhudhaaney

hey kaatchi maarum podhum
invan aattam maaraadhey
hey aatchi maarum podhum
indha koottam maaraadhey
vare vaa vaa vare vaa..

bang bang bang
bang bang bang

Oor muluka anbirukku
thozh kodukka natpirukku
naanga sertha sothu
ellam adhudhaaney.

Niyayam
vella sattam venaam
dharmam
seiyya pattam venaam
vazhakayoda
thaththuvamey adhudhaaney

Nee kaasa veesipaaru
inga velaikkaagaadhe
un rendu sottu kanneer
podhum yedhum pesaadhey.
arrey vare vaa vaa
vare vaa..

Raju bhai
onna kannaala paaththaaley
bang bang bang

Raju bhai vandhu
munnaala ninnaa
bang bang bang
